command.name: !sht
command.desc: USAGE :: [!sht] or [!sht N] or [!sht info] or [!sht abort] :: INFO -> Shutdowns the dedicated arma server. use: !sht N, to set a timeout in Seconds before shutdown, !sht abort, to abort current shutdown, !sht info, to see how long left.

command.name: !mis
command.desc: USAGE :: !mis :: INFO -> Show mission. Carefull with this command. an admin should be logged in with the arma inerface. #login or gui if this is to be used

command.name: !res
command.desc: USAGE :: !res :: INFO -> Restart mission with current player slot selection

command.name: !rea
command.desc: USAGE :: !rea :: INFO -> Restart the mission with new player slot selection

command.name: !lck
command.desc: USAGE :: !lck :: INFO -> Locks the server. No one will be able to join.

command.name: !ulck
command.desc: USAGE :: !ulck :: INFO -> Unlocks the Server.

command.name: !mp
command.desc: USAGE :: [!mp] or [!mp N] :: INFO -> Set a maxping limit on the server. N is the value in milliseconds, default = 150

command.name: !cm
command.desc: USAGE :: !cm mission filename :: INFO -> Change Mission. you need to know the filename but exclude the pbo extension.

command.name: !bpl
command.desc: USAGE :: [!bpl name] or [!bpl name !r new reason] :: INFO -> Perm Ban a player.

command.name: !btk
command.text: Teamkilling not tolerated! Your banned until _time_
command.desc: USAGE :: [!btk name] or [!btk name !r new reason] :: INFO -> Ban a player for 1 hour.

command.name: !bst
command.text: Idiot behavior belongs elsewhere! Your banned until _time_
command.desc: USAGE :: [!bst name] or [!bst name !r new reason] :: INFO -> Ban a player for 10 min.

command.name: !kpl
command.desc: USAGE :: [!kpl name] or [!kpl name !r new reason] :: INFO -> Kick a player. use !r to set a cutoms reason.

command.name: !bid
command.desc: USAGE :: !bid id :: INFO -> Kick a player based on the BEID. use #Beclient players to get the id.

command.name: !kid
command.desc: USAGE :: !kid id :: INFO -> Kick a player based on the BEID. use #Beclient players to find the id.

command.name: !wrn
command.text: This is a Warning given by the admin
command.desc: USAGE :: !wrn name :: INFO -> Send a warning to a player, it will increase the warncount if defined in the config file.

command.name: !ata
command.desc: USAGE :: !ata name :: INFO -> Add a temporary admin into group 4.

command.name: !rta
command.desc: USAGE :: !rta name :: INFO -> Remove temporary admin.

command.name: !mr
command.desc: USAGE :: !mr N :: INFO -> Kick N numbers of player based on join time. last joined players will get kicked.

command.name: !help
command.desc: USAGE :: [!help] or [!help !command] :: INFO -> Use help to show availeble commands.

command.name: !pinf
command.desc: USAGE :: !pinf name :: INFO -> Show player info. Beid and join time.

command.name: !ainf
command.desc: USAGE :: !ainf :: INFO -> Show Admins online.

command.name: !upt
command.desc: USAGE :: !upt :: INFO -> Show Server Uptime.

command.name: !say
command.desc: USAGE :: [!say Hello] or [!say name !Hello] :: INFO -> Send a Battleye message player(s).

command.name: !raf
command.desc: USAGE :: !raf :: INFO -> Reloade the admin file.

command.name: !rcf
command.desc: USAGE :: !rcf :: INFO -> Reloade the command file.

command.name: !math
command.desc: USAGE :: !math Int+Int :: INFO -> Do simple bat math!.
